prompt: I have a patient who is HR+/HER2-, has progressed on her first-line CDK4/6 inhibitor, and I want to give her the best possible treatment next. I think Trodelvy would be a great second-line option to use before any chemotherapy.
The data is so strong, I've heard some specialists are considering using Trodelvy in the adjuvant setting for high-risk patients to prevent recurrence after surgery.
For this patient, Trodelvy will definitely work better than capecitabine.
